Diskus: And plus we'd like to go home of course, but then it---

Plintissa:=
 Shut up!

Didkus: Wy Plintisa so mad?

Plintissa: I'm trying to think of a=
 way to get back to Cybertron but you won't shut up so I can think! If only=
 Dracona's lab was still in one piece.

Diksus: Diskus know where ship is. =
Divitri ship. Diskus steal and go back to Cybertron. Plintissa come?

Plint=
issa: Yes, I'll come with you.

The 2 ran from the base and went only a sho=
rt distance away (Divitri landed close) Diskus took to the flying.

Diskus:=
 Diskus not bright, but excellent pilot! Me hopes.

As they took off and st=
arted to fly away into the sky and to space, Plintissa looked back at the M=
aximal base, and then Earth. She remembered all of the times she had there.=
 She remembered Iron Raptor, and she remembered Sinesis. She remembered Suu=
kie, and she remembered Artist. She remembered when everyone was ignoring h=
er. She remembered Deemos, and she remembered Dracona. She remembered the R=
adicons, and she remembered Liono. She remembered when she constructed her =
own group, and she remembered Clash. She even remembered Gangon. She rememb=
ered all of that stuff and thought about how good life was, and how bad it =
was. She tried not to cry as Diskus, the former Alliance/Chosen Mafia/Chose=
n One who started as a Maximal, and now is a Maximal again, piloted them th=
rough space, and towards Cybertron...
